name: Responsive Design: Good Idea or Great Idea?
body: ### Everyone’s Talking about it… What is is? I’ll give an overview on what people are talking about when they say “Responsive” and share some tips on getting up and running faster with this approach. ## You don’t have to fork it to read it Read through the presentation and view online demos at rdgg.ryanparsley.com.
